modName: Bobs Boots Conversion for SevenBase MoreBounce HDT REQUIRED - DELETED
descriptionHtml:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-First things first: hahaha
Ok if you got any questions please feel free to ask my friend amevenAstral9, she like recieving questions.....but what she like more than that is to answer to these questions.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Bobs Boots Conversion for SevenBase MoreBounce By AmevenAstral9 and Crazy1918.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Ok guys this is for all fans of this mod but like me can't use it cose we use the Beautifull SevenBase Body so i give to you this conversion of the V8.0 V8.1 V8.2 and V8.3 versions IN A ONE AND SINGLE ESP....ENJOY.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Requirements:
-HDT HighHeels System.

Installation:
-Just unpack the file in your skyrim data folder.

Uninstallation:
1-Disable the mod.
2-delete the BSA BSL and the ESP.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How to get the boots:
-Craftable section Leather.
OR:
-You can found the items in a barrel located in whiterun, between adrianne forge and breezehome.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Know issus:
-Some minor clip in around the knee area "only in extreme poses".

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Future plans:
-Create a single esp for all versions...( DONE ).

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credit:
-SevenBase Body Replacer.
-Beazalbob69 For the Bob's Boots.
author: Crazy1918andAmevenAstral9
